Value.label: Watt meter report period
Value.Help: If the setting is configured for 1 hour (value=720), the TZ88 will report its instant power consumption every 1 hour.

Value.label: kWh meter report period
Value.Help: If the setting is configured for 1 hour (value=6), the TZ88 will report its accumulated power consumption (kWh) every 1 hour.
